data.reason: No candidate cleanly matches prior WON Tier 1/Tier 2 profiles while also respecting risk rules: GMT gain 26.5% and RSI 64.6 → chasing (gain >15% disallowed); POL gain 14.2% and RSI 70.1 → extended and RSI >70, unlike prior POL win which had RSI ~55 and lower daily gain; RENDER RSI 54.7 but MACD line (0.06) < signal (0.07), so no bullish confirmation; STX RSI 62.5 with only BUY (not STRONG_BUY) and MACD flat, closer to LOSING high-RSI setups; ATOM RSI 61.2 and gain 6.9% (Tier 2-like) but 1H only BUY and VW-RSI 76.9 indicates overbought risk. With BTC neutral and no setup clearly mirroring successful POL/IRYS/AAVE patterns, capital is better preserved by not forcing a trade.
